title: Generative AI People Intelligence Agent (PIA)
description: Leading the implementation of a cutting-edge Generative AI People Intelligence Agent at Gilead Sciences, working as Business Analyst and Prompt Engineer to revolutionize HR analytics and workforce insights.
highlights: Part of team implementing new Generative AI People Intelligence Agent (PIA)
Working on Business Analysis and Prompt Engineering for AI-powered HR platforms
Led scaling of HR Analytics projects using advanced AI technologies
Developed automated insights for workforce planning and employee engagement
